Prerequisites

Installing Ed.

Gatsby

Markdown

Poetry

Indenting lines of poetry has been made infinitely easier with the gatsby-remark-bracketed-spans plugin. Class names are handled by the poem.js style sheet, and are injected via brackets in the poem's markdown. So, you can markup the beginning of Emily Dickinson's poem, "Delayed till she had ceased to know" as follows, and the third line will be indented twice.

- DELAYED till she had ceased to know,	
- Delayed till in its vest of snow	
- [Her loving bosom lay.]{.indent-2}
